dataList.title: How winnings are calculated?
dataList.text: Calculate your winnings by multiplying the current odds with your bets placed.

dataList.title: How do I get the winnings?
dataList.text: Before the plane explodes, quickly collect the winnings from your previous bet. If the plane explodes, all bets placed on that destroyed plane will be void.

dataList.title: What is the minimum bid on Bonanza?
dataList.text: The smallest amount you can bet is 0,10€ and you can bet on one, two or three spaceships. So the maximum bet will be either 0,10€ or 0,30€.
